entry.source: {F812}Squinting man\0{F87A,59}Ah, it's you.{F801}{F802}Seems you managed to kill Peallaidh.{F801}Everyone's been buzzing about it here.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Squiting man\0{F87A,59}Oh, right, the Counter-Demon Force{F801}Base...{F801}{F802}It's in Nagata-cho. Just cross the{F801}river and head west.{F801}
